scripts.remove-builds: (cd packages/backend && rm -rf build) & (cd packages/shared && rm -rf dist)
scripts.build: yarn remove-builds && yarn build-shared || true && yarn build-backend && yarn build-shared
scripts.watch-build: yarn remove-builds && yarn build-shared || true && (yarn build-backend:watch & (sleep 5 && yarn build-shared:watch))
scripts.start-server: (cd packages/backend && yarn dev) & (cd packages/frontend && yarn dev)
